CB Chara Go Nagai World: Various characters from Go Nagai works including Devil Man, Mazinger, and Violence Jack, become trapped in a parody world where they all be come super deformed. They get trapped in this mishmash, fighting each other and are trying to figure a way back to their own world.
['Violence Jack: Harlem Bomber-hen', 'Devilman', 'Mazinger Z', 'Devilman: Yochou Sirene-hen']
